trans-unit.source: Defines the basic functionality that represents the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: Definisce la funzionalità di base che rappresenta i dati di personalizzazione per una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this base class contain the actual implementation for managing, applying, and extracting personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che derivano da questa classe di base contengono l'implementazione effettiva per la gestione, l'applicazione e l'estrazione dei dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class makes use of personalization state with a reference to PersonalizationState.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe utilizzare lo stato di personalizzazione con un riferimento a PersonalizationState.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: If a developer writes a custom PersonalizationState implementation, a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> must also be written.
trans-unit.target: Se lo sviluppatore scrive un'implementazione personalizzata di PersonalizationState, un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>deve inoltre essere scritto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instances are responsible for creating and consuming PersonalizationState instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>le istanze sono responsabili per la creazione e dell'utilizzo delle istanze PersonalizationState.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The object created by this constructor manages the state for Web Parts controls that are managed by the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto creato da questo costruttore gestisce lo stato per i controlli Web part che vengono gestiti dall'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> that manages Web Parts controls that have personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> che gestisce i controlli Web part che dispongono di dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The webPartManager parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The webPartManager parameter is .

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override, applica i dati sulla personalizzazione di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo associato all'istanza di stato di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control was a parameter in the constructor that created the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo era un parametro nel costruttore che ha creato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override, applica i dati di personalizzazione per il controllo di Web part specificato.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to apply personalization data to a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta della definizione del metodo utilizzato per applicare i dati di personalizzazione di un controllo Web part astratta.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is applied.
trans-unit.target: Applicazione per cui la personalizzazione dei dati di controllo Web part.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization information from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the current personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override, estrae le informazioni sulla personalizzazione dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo associato con lo stato corrente di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of a method used to extract personalization information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta della definizione astratta di un metodo utilizzato per estrarre le informazioni sulla personalizzazione dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo associato con il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> was a parameter in the constructor that was used to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>era un parametro nel costruttore utilizzato per creare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization data from the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override, estrae i dati di personalizzazione dal controllo Web part specificato.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to extract personalization data from a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta della definizione del metodo utilizzato per estrarre i dati di personalizzazione di un controllo Web part astratta.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control from which personalization data is extracted.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo Web part da cui personalizzazione vengono estratti dati.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il filtro di autorizzazione per il controllo di Web part specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> string for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control before an instance of it is created.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>stringa per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllare prima di creata un'istanza.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should return `null` if there is no personalized value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo deve restituire `null` se è presente alcun valore personalizzato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set does not implement any default behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part non implementa alcun comportamento predefinito per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is provided so that a developer can assign an arbitrary string value to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; this property can be checked by subscribing to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on a page to determine whether the control can be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà viene fornita in modo che uno sviluppatore di assegnare un valore stringa arbitrario a un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo; proprietà può essere controllata con la sottoscrizione di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>evento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo in una pagina per determinare se il controllo può essere aggiunto alla pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control from which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*> is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: L'ID del controllo Web part da cui il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>viene recuperato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter*>

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter string for a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: La stringa di filtro di autorizzazione per un controllo Web part.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether any personalization information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se le informazioni sulla personalizzazione sono stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class checks this property to determine whether the personalization state needs to be written back to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe controlla questa proprietà per determinare se lo stato di personalizzazione deve essere scritto nuovamente nell'archivio dati sottostante.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any personalization state instance has changed (is "dirty"); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se qualsiasi istanza dello stato di personalizzazione è stata modificata (è "dirty"); in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, gets a value that indicates whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override, ottiene un valore che indica se lo stato di qualsiasi personalizzazione è stato estratto da un'istanza di stato.

trans-unit.source: This property is an abstract definition of a property that can be called to determine whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è una definizione di una proprietà che può essere chiamata per determinare se lo stato di qualsiasi personalizzazione è stato estratto da un'istanza di stato astratta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any personalization state was extracted by a state instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se lo stato di qualsiasi personalizzazione è stato estratto da un'istanza di stato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Marks the current personalization state as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Contrassegna lo stato di personalizzazione corrente come modificato.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> can use this method to mark themselves as having changed (or being "dirty"), thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che ereditano da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>può utilizzare questo metodo per contrassegnarsi come modificato (o da "dirty"), a indicare la necessità di riserializzare e salvare lo stato di personalizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks a Web Parts control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override, contrassegna un controllo Web part come modificato.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract definition of the method used to indicate that a Web Parts control has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Si tratta di una definizione astratta del metodo utilizzato per indicare che un controllo Web part è stata modificata (è "dirty").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class exposes methods (which in turn call this method) that can be used by developers to mark a Web Parts control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe espone metodi (che a sua volta chiamano questo metodo) che possono essere usati dagli sviluppatori per contrassegnare un controllo Web part come "dirty", a indicare la necessità di riserializzare e salvare lo stato di personalizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di Web part deve essere contrassegnato come modificato.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override, contrassegna associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo come modificato.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance is now considered to have changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Si tratta della definizione astratta del metodo utilizzato per indicare che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>istanza associata di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>istanza è considerata sono stati modificati (è "dirty").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class exposes a protected method (which in turn calls this method) that can be used by developers to mark the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe espone un metodo protetto (che a sua volta chiama questo metodo) che può essere usato dagli sviluppatori per contrassegnare l'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo come "dirty", a indicare la necessità di riserializzare e salvare lo stato di personalizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the specified Web Parts control is valid.
trans-unit.target: Verifica che il controllo di Web part specificato sia valido.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that `webPart` is a valid Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo verifica che `webPart` un controllo Web part valido.

trans-unit.source: The base class verifies that `webPart` is not `null` and is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Consente di verificare che la classe di base `webPart` non `null` ed è gestito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo associato con il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> should validate Web Parts controls inside of any methods that work with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che derivano da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>deve convalidare i controlli Web part all'interno di metodi che funzionano con <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>istanze.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that standalone <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances do not have state changes accidentally written into the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: Ciò garantisce che autonomo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>istanze non le modifiche di stato scritte accidentalmente nei dati di personalizzazione per una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di Web part da convalidare.

trans-unit.source: webPart is not currently managed by the associated with the .
trans-unit.target: webPartnon è attualmente gestito dal associato il .

trans-unit.source: webPart is
trans-unit.target: webPart è

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control currently associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo attualmente associato all'istanza di stato di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is the object used as a parameter for the constructor that creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo rappresenta l'oggetto utilizzato come parametro del costruttore che crea il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState"> </xref>.
